channel.title: [FIXED] Client/Server Broke?!
channel.description:
[b]LOL :eek: sorry...an item corrupted my character or something. :o
It's all good now...thanks for no one helping me...but whatever this was up for like almost an hour at night, didn't expect an answer. Thanks for reading this I guess?[/b] ;D :)
[s][b]Short story:[/b] When I log in, it freezes. I tried everything I know to fix this. I redownloaded the client, but it still doesn't work. I redownloaded the cache, but it still doesn't work.
[b]Full story:[/b] Please help. I'm not sure what's wrong. I was just standing around on my PI server (it's not online or anything) looking for cool fish on a list on notepad. I added a few items using commands and their image appeared blank. I was wondering WTF was wrong at that point, but I was like whatever. Then, every other item I added thereon (like 5 items) had a blank icon, no drop model, and no wear model. So, I closed and reopened the client. The items were back to normal and everything. A little later (like 3 minutes) I added another item. Guess what...the icon was blank and everything. So, I did the same thing. I closed and reopened the client, but this time, it froze when I logged in. I then saw the error in the Client.bat. So, I thought it was just my cache. I had a backup of the cache when I first downloaded the client (downloaded like a week or so ago). So, I replaced the cache, but it still showed the error and it still froze on log in. So, I thought it was my client (that's my problem, client is freezing), so I replaced the client folder (I also had a backup of the client), but it still does the same thing every single time. I tried restarting my computer and everything. What do I do??
By the way, those green things are legs, and are always there when I first log in. The change clothes interface appears for a second when I first log in (not sure why). Now, my problem makes it last forever (frozen).
Also, I made a new character, and it logged me on, but it was SUPER LAGGY at first. I then relogged back in and it was fine, except that in the cmd it still says "Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36". At least it doesn't freeze. I'm starting to think an item broke me!
[img]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/6717/wtfhelp.png[/img] [code] Operating System: Windows 7 6.1 ShadyScape - Client. Revision: 317 Error: 11 - 123.0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutofBoundsExeption: 11797 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:196) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:594) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8307) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2174) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8122) at client.processDrawing{client.java:8885} at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:94) at client.run(client.java:5008) at java.lang.Thread.run(Uknown Source) [/code]
:| :confused: :| [/s]

item.title: [FIXED] Client/Server Broke?!
item.dc:creator: @adamknightz adamknightz
item.description:
@adamknightz wrote:

[b]LOL :eek: sorry…an item corrupted my character or something. :o

It’s all good now…thanks for no one helping me…but whatever this was up for like almost an hour at night, didn’t expect an answer. Thanks for reading this I guess?[/b] ;D

[s]Short story:
When I log in, it freezes. I tried everything I know to fix this. I redownloaded the client, but it still doesn’t work. I redownloaded the cache, but it still doesn’t work.

Full story:
Please help. I’m not sure what’s wrong. I was just standing around on my PI server (it’s not online or anything) looking for cool fish on a list on notepad. I added a few items using commands and their image appeared blank. I was wondering WTF was wrong at that point, but I was like whatever. Then, every other item I added thereon (like 5 items) had a blank icon, no drop model, and no wear model. So, I closed and reopened the client. The items were back to normal and everything. A little later (like 3 minutes) I added another item. Guess what…the icon was blank and everything. So, I did the same thing. I closed and reopened the client, but this time, it froze when I logged in. I then saw the error in the Client.bat. So, I thought it was just my cache. I had a backup of the cache when I first downloaded the client (downloaded like a week or so ago). So, I replaced the cache, but it still showed the error and it still froze on log in. So, I thought it was my client (that’s my problem, client is freezing), so I replaced the client folder (I also had a backup of the client), but it still does the same thing every single time. I tried restarting my computer and everything. What do I do??

By the way, those green things are legs, and are always there when I first log in. The change clothes interface appears for a second when I first log in (not sure why). Now, my problem makes it last forever (frozen).

Also, I made a new character, and it logged me on, but it was SUPER LAGGY at first. I then relogged back in and it was fine, except that in the cmd it still says “Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36”. At least it doesn’t freeze. I’m starting to think an item broke me!

Operating System: Windows 7 6.1
ShadyScape - Client.
Revision: 317
Error: 11 - 123.0 - 36,36
Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutofBoundsExeption: 11797
                 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:196)
                 at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:594)
                 at client.drawInterface(client.java:8307)
                 at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2174)
                 at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8122)
                 at client.processDrawing{client.java:8885}
                 at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:94)
                 at client.run(client.java:5008)
                 at java.lang.Thread.run(Uknown Source)


[/s]
